original: Bursell, Claes Birger Theodor, sparbanksdirektör, Göteborg, f. 7/1/83 i Gbg av köpm. Klas A. V. B. o. Hildegard Lundberg. G. 09 m. Ewa Låft-man. Barn: Anders Birger Svante f. 10, leg. läk., Claes Göran Birger 14, ing. — Ex. fr. Gbgs hand :’inst 00, Anst. i Gbgs Sparbank :s. å., kassör där 05, kamr. 17, verkst. dir. sed. 31, verkst. dir. i Ränte- o. Kap iförsäkr :-anst. i Gbg sed. 31. V. ordf. i styr. f. Sparbankernas Bank A-B, led. av styr. f. Sv. sparbanksfören. o. Sv. sparbank. garantikassa. RNO, RVO, PatrstGM, Sv. sparb:fören. stGM.
translated: Bursell, Claes Birger Theodor, savings bank director, Gothenburg, born January 7th 1883 in Gothenburg to merchant Klas A.V.B. and Hildegard Lundberg. Married in 1909 to Ewa Låft-man. Children: Anders Birger Svante born 1910, medical doctor, Claes Göran Birger born 1914, engineer. Graduated from Gothenburg's Handelsinstitut in 1900. Employed at Gothenburg's Sparbank the same year, Treasurer in 1905, Assistant Manager in 1917, Managing Director since 1931, Managing Director at Ränte- & Kapitalförsäkringsanstalten in Gothenburg since 1931. Deputy Chairman of the Board for Sparbankernas Bank AB, board member of Svenska Sparbanksföreningen and Svenska Sparbankernas Garantikassa. Holder of RNO, RVO, PatrstGM, and Svenska Sparbanksföreningen's stGM honors.
